    • Method Detail

      • obtainConnection

        Connection obtainConnection​(ConnectionParameters parameters)
                     throws SQLException
        Obtain a valid connection ready to accept requests
        Parameters:
        parameters - The connection parameters
        Returns:
        A valid connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - when the connection was not successfully retrieved

      • releaseConnection

        void releaseConnection​(Connection connection)
                throws SQLException
        Release the connection because it is not required anymore
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        SQLException

      • refreshConnection

        default Connection refreshConnection​(Connection connection,
                                     ConnectionParameters connectionParameters)
                              throws SQLException
        Obtain a valid connection according to an existing connection. If the current connection is closed or invalid, a new one will be retrieved; otherwise, the current connection is returned.
        Parameters:
        connection - The current connection
        Returns:
        A valid connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - when the connection was not successfully retrieved *
